reviews.text: The food here is outstanding. We ordered a beef steak with mushroom sauce, which was a true masterpiece. The noodles were also excellent. The staff was incredibly friendly, even letting us in before opening because of the heavy rain. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Sarajevo.

We come here often for a dinner and the is always amazing. Beef, potatoes and salmon fusion we had yesterday was very tasty and fresh! The menu is very simple but everything is great! With years it became a family place for dinner for us. Friendly and helpful staff! All compliments!

Waiter was warm and friendly. Food was made with lots of love and delicious - I got the beef and wow the quality of that meat was something else!

Just make sure to book ahead bc it does get busy.
Their Wok is the best in Sarajevo. The servers and chefs are super fun and nice. The overall vibe is excellent; the food to match.

UPDATE: Still one of the best restaurants in Sarajevo and dear chef Rasim puts every bit of love in making delicious food.

3 years ago: Very delicious food with professional and nice waiters and chefs. Cozy atmosphere and nice interior. Would recommend to everyone who likes delicious food. And yes, very important is that this restaurant does not have menu. Chef combines your food with your suggestions. Fusion cuisine!
